verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Depart עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> [and] go up מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> here אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you וְהָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> hence thou and the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶֽעֱלִ֖יתָ <S%H5927><s%> which thou hast brought up מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> and to Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> Unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5414><s%> will I give

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <S%H7971><s%> And I will send לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before מַלְאָ֑ךְ <S%H4397><s%> an angel וְגֵֽרַשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H1644><s%> thee and I will drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanite הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> the Amorite וְהַֽחִתִּי֙ <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzite הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivite וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusite

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Unto a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> flowing חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶֽעֱלֶ֜ה <S%H5927><s%> for I will not go up בְּקִרְבְּךָ֗ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֙רֶף֙ <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> and I פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> might אֲכֶלְךָ֖ <S%H3615><s%> lest I consume בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> thee in the way

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> And when the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> tidings הָרָ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> these evil הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיִּתְאַבָּ֑לוּ <S%H56><s%> they mourned וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁ֛תוּ <S%H7896><s%> did put אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and no man עֶדְי֖וֹ <S%H5716><s%> on him his ornaments עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> churlish עֹ֔רֶף <S%H6203><s%> stiff-necked רֶ֧גַע <S%H7281><s%> moment אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> of thee in a אֶֽעֱלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> I will come up בְקִרְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7130><s%> into the midst וְכִלִּיתִ֑יךָ <S%H3615><s%> and consume וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הוֹרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> thee therefore now put off עֶדְיְךָ֙ <S%H5716><s%> thy ornaments מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְאֵדְעָ֖ה <S%H3045><s%> from thee that I may know מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what to do לָּֽךְ׃

וַיִּֽתְנַצְּל֧וּ <S%H5337><s%> stripped בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶדְיָ֖ם <S%H5716><s%> themselves of their ornaments מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> by the mount חוֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> Horeb

וּמֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses יִקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹ֜הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle וְנָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> and pitched ל֣וֹ ׀ מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> it without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֗ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp הַרְחֵק֙ <S%H7368><s%> afar off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> from the camp וְקָ֥רָא <S%H7121><s%> and called ל֖וֹ אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> it the Tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone מְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> And it came to pass [that] every one which sought יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> unto the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> which [was] without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the camp

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came כְּצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> went out מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And it came to pass when Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> unto the tabernacle יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> rose up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> [that] all the people וְנִ֨צְּב֔וּ <S%H5324><s%> and stood אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> door אָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> [at] his tent וְהִבִּ֙יטוּ֙ <S%H5027><s%> and looked אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> until he was gone הָאֹֽהֱלָה׃ <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כְּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> entered מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And it came to pass as Moses הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle יֵרֵד֙ <S%H3381><s%> descended עַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> the cloudy וְעָמַ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle וְדִבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and [the LORD] talked עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> with Moses

וְרָאָ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> saw כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֣וּד <S%H5982><s%> pillar הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> the cloudy עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> stand פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> door הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> [at] the tabernacle וְקָ֤ם <S%H6965><s%> rose up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֔וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> door אָהֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H168><s%> [in] his tent

וְדִבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> to face כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> speaketh אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> as a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto his friend וְשָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> And he turned again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> into the camp וּמְשָׁ֨רְת֜וֹ <S%H8334><s%> but his servant יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נוּן֙ <S%H5126><s%> of Nun נַ֔עַר <S%H5288><s%> a young man לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָמִ֖ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> departed מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> not out הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD רְ֠אֵה <S%H7200><s%> See אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> You אֹמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> thou sayest אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> to me הַ֚עַל <S%H5927><s%> unto me Bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הֽוֹדַעְתַּ֔נִי <S%H3045><s%> and thou hast not let me know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom תִּשְׁלַ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> whom thou wilt send עִמִּ֑י <S%H5973><s%> with וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> with me Yet thou hast said יְדַעְתִּ֣יךָֽ <S%H3045><s%> I know בְשֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> thee by name וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> have also מָצָ֥אתָ <S%H4672><s%> and thou hast also found חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> in my sight

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> pray מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> Now therefore I pray thee if I have found חֵ֜ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight הוֹדִעֵ֤נִי <S%H3045><s%> shew נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> pray אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּרָכֶ֔ךָ <S%H1870><s%> me now thy way וְאֵדָ֣עֲךָ֔ <S%H3045><s%> that I may know לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> thee that I may find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight וּרְאֵ֕ה <S%H7200><s%> and consider כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> [is] thy people הַגּ֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> that this nation הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And he said פָּנַ֥י <S%H6440><s%> My presence יֵלֵ֖כוּ <S%H1980><s%> shall go וַהֲנִחֹ֥תִי <S%H5117><s%> [with thee] and I will give thee rest לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> else פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> unto him If thy presence הֹלְכִ֔ים <S%H1980><s%> go אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּעֲלֵ֖נוּ <S%H5927><s%> not [with me] carry us not up מִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> here

וּבַמֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> how יִוָּדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> For wherein shall it be known אֵפ֗וֹא <S%H645><s%> here כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> have found חֵ֤ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> your sight אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I וְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> that I and thy people הֲל֖וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H1980><s%> along עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with וְנִפְלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H6395><s%> with us? so shall we be separated אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I וְעַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> I and thy people מִכָּ֨ל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> from all the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are upon פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [are] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> will also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> of which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> also that thou hast spoken אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> I will do כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָצָ֤אתָ <S%H4672><s%> for thou hast found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight וָאֵדָעֲךָ֖ <S%H3045><s%> and I know בְּשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H8034><s%> thee by name
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> And he said הַרְאֵ֥נִי <S%H7200><s%> shew נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּבֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> me thy glory

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> Myself אַעֲבִ֤יר <S%H5674><s%> pass כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all טוּבִי֙ <S%H2898><s%> I will make all my goodness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְקָרָ֧אתִֽי <S%H7121><s%> before thee and I will proclaim בְשֵׁ֛ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְחַנֹּתִי֙ <S%H2603><s%> thee and will be gracious אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to whom אָחֹ֔ן <S%H2603><s%> to whom I will be gracious וְרִחַמְתִּ֖י <S%H7355><s%> and will shew mercy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אֲרַחֵֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> on whom I will shew mercy

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> Thou canst לִרְאֹ֣ת <S%H7200><s%> not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> my face כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִרְאַ֥נִי <S%H7200><s%> see הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> for there shall no man וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> me and live

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> Behold [there is] a place אִתִּ֑י <S%H853><s%> וְנִצַּבְתָּ֖ <S%H5324><s%> by me and thou shalt stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַצּֽוּר׃ <S%H6697><s%> upon a rock

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> passeth by כְּבֹדִ֔י <S%H3519><s%> And it shall come to pass while my glory וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H7760><s%> that I will put בְּנִקְרַ֣ת <S%H5366><s%> thee in a clift הַצּ֑וּר <S%H6697><s%> of the rock וְשַׂכֹּתִ֥י <S%H5526><s%> and will cover כַפִּ֛י <S%H3709><s%> thee with my hand עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> while עָבְרִֽי׃ <S%H5674><s%> I pass by

וַהֲסִרֹתִי֙ <S%H5493><s%> And I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּפִּ֔י <S%H3709><s%> away mine hand וְרָאִ֖יתָ <S%H7200><s%> and thou shalt see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֹרָ֑י <S%H268><s%> my back parts וּפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> but my face לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרָאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall not be seen ס
